info.description: API Server untuk manajemen dan pelaporan prestasi mahasiswa.
info.title: Sistem Pelaporan Prestasi API

get.description: Get a list of achievement references for the logged-in student

post.description: Create a new achievement record (Mahasiswa only)

get.description: Retrieve full details of an achievement from MongoDB

delete.description: Soft delete achievement from system (Mahasiswa only)

post.description: Upload/Add file URL to an achievement

get.description: Retrieve status history and metadata of an achievement

post.description: Reject achievement with a note (Dosen Wali only)
Change status from Draft to Submitted for verification
Approve achievement and assign points (Dosen Wali only)
Authenticate user and return access & refresh tokens

get.description: Retrieve the logged-in user's profile information

post.description: Get a new access token using a valid refresh token

get.description: Get a list of all lecturers in the system
List all students assigned to a specific lecturer
Retrieve statistics based on role (Admin: Global, Dosen Wali: Advisees, Mahasiswa: Own).
Get total points and student details (Accessible by Mhs for own, Dosen for advisees).
Get a list of all students with their advisors (Admin only)
Get detailed information of a student by their UUID
List all achievement status and points for a specific student

put.description: Assign a lecturer as an advisor to a student (Admin only)

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of all registered users

post.description: Create a new user record in the system (Admin only)

get.description: Retrieve detailed information of a specific user

put.description: Change the access role of a user
